conclusion: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient
docname: CASE OF DEUMELAND v. GERMANY - [Russian Translation]
externalsources: Reich Insurance Code (Reichsversicherungsordnung);Brussels Labour Court of Appeal, Judgment of 11 May 1984, Journal des Tribunaux 1985, pp. 168-169
